code: export function charactersSortByName(characters){var charactersSortByName=characters.sort(function(personPrev,personCurr){return personPrev.name.localeCompare(personCurr.name);});return charactersSortByName;};var formattedToLowerCase=function formattedToLowerCase(string){return string.toLocaleLowerCase();};export function filterByName(characters,query){return characters.filter(function(character){var foundName=formattedToLowerCase(character.name).includes(formattedToLowerCase(query));return foundName;});}export function greetingUser(user){var userName=user.split(' ')[0];return"Hello ".concat(userName,"!");}
